items.sentence: I guess what I've said isn't all that clear, but that's the only way I can explain it.
Tom is going to hurt his ears if he doesn't stop listening to his music at full blast.
Tom, stop teasing your brother! You wouldn't like it if he did that to you, would you?
Girders usually have a cross section designed to maximize their resistance to bending.
Democracy is the worst form of government, except all the others that have been tried.
